meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Water</kanji> <kanji>erupts</kanji> from <vocabulary>water fountains</vocabulary>. Sometimes they're big eruptions and sometimes they're small, but they're always fun to watch and enjoy in the hot summer.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
